sub_title: Shore Crossing, MicroTunnel and Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) Specialist
summary:
30 years’ experience in Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) and Micro Tunneling, from feasibility studies in early design to site management during construction, and all the steps in between.

Subject Matter Expert in Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) and Micro Tunnelling (Pipe Jacking), through soft soil and hard rock, 
Also familiar with;
- Direct Pipe
- Segment lined tunneling; large diameter TBM's; Slurry shields and earth pressure balance shields  (EPB)
- Pipeline shore pull operations; beach pulls and barge pulls, open cut and cover, and through casings & tunnels.
- Pipeline pre-commissioning; flooding, gauging, cleaning, hydro testing, drying, Nitrogen and MEG fill,
- Diving and ROV operations,
- Land surveying / Pilot hole guidance systems,
- Design, Construction and Contract Management.

Package Engineering and Company Representation for Design & Construction of pipeline river, road and shoreline crossings for the Civil and the Oil and Gas Industry.

“hands-on” attitude developed at construction sites worldwide.

Excellent communication skills; fluent in English and Dutch, practical knowledge of German and Portuguese (Brazilian) and basics of French and Spanish.

Team player, acknowledged by peers and awarded by senior management for initiatives, attitude, expertise and delivery.

treasury_media.title: "Micro" - Tunneling  :)
treasury_media.description: The Tunnel Boring Machines (TBMs) are usually a bit bigger . . .

awards.title: Golden Gecko Award
awards.description:
Chevron Australia has been awarded the 2015 Golden Gecko Award for Environmental Excellence for the Wheatstone Micro-tunnel Shore Crossing Project, an innovative pipeline shore crossing solution.    

The Golden Gecko Award is a prestigious environmental award from the Department of Mines and Petroleum (DMP) of the Government of Western Australia. DMP-Executive Director Environment Dr Phil Gorey said the project stood out to the selection committee and was a very deserving recipient of the 2015 Golden Gecko Award.

The Wheatstone micro-tunnel (diameter 2.0m ID / 2.5m OD x 1,250m length) is the first large scale micro-tunnel shore crossing in Australia and within Chevron worldwide and it is the longest pipe-jacked tunnel in the southern hemisphere; it links a 44inch - 225km long offshore gas pipeline to the onshore processing facilities, protecting the coastal area adjacent to the Ashburton River Delta.

Over a 4 year's period, I have contributed to the success of the Wheatstone MicroTunnel from early start (concept selection and feasibility) all the way to construction completion as MicroTunnel Subject Matter Expert (SME) and as Chevron's Upstream Person in Charge (PIC) on Site.
awards.issuer: The Department of Mines and Petroleum (DMP) of the Government of Western Australia.

awards.title: Operational Excellence Award
awards.description:
In August 2013, as Person in Charge (PIC) for Chevron's Wheatstone Microtunnel Shore Crossing Project in Onslow, Western Australia, I received the Operational Excellence Award from Chevron Australia's CEO Roy Krzywosinski as acknowledgment for showing strong safety leadership.

The Operational Excellence Award was presented in  recognition of [quote] "Epitomizing the Chevron Way behaviors – notably high performance, ingenuity and protecting people and the environment".

certifications.name: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) - Elctro, Mechanical and Welding techniques

company.name: FlowTex EGYPT for Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD)

profile_positions.company: FlowTex EGYPT for Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD)
profile_positions.description:
Project Manager for Egypt’s leading HDD-contractor, FLOWTEX EGYPT, to deliver the HDD-scope of SAUDI ARAMCO’s BERRI-Expansion Project in Al Jubail, Saudi Arabia.

The HDD-Scope includes a total of 7.5km of HDD-profile, divided over 6 crossings, with diameters from 8 to 24-inch; 
>  2 land-to land crossings
>  2 shore approaches 
>  2 “water-to-water crossings”, where all equipment is installed offshore at either side of the crossing. 

Main contractor for the pipeline project, on- and offshore, is SAIPEM.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

company.name: Design and Construction of Trenchless Pipeline Crossings

profile_positions.company: Design and Construction of Trenchless Pipeline Crossings
profile_positions.description:
Electro-Mechanical Engineer with 30 years experience in the design and construction management of Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) and MicroTunnel projects.

Experience include assignments with Contractors as well as representing Clients; Company Rep, Resident Engineer, Person in Charge, Subject Matter Expert.

Design & construction of Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) and Micro Tunnel projects for the Civil and Oil & Gas industry, worldwide.

Package engineering and Company representation for pipeline shore crossing projects by means of HDD, microtunneling (pipe jacking),  through soft soil and hard rock, and open cut & cover (beach pull / barge pull).

Coordination of, and specialist input to; 
•	Route and site selection,
•	Construction method selection, 
•	Constructability evaluation,
•	Concept design, FEED, Detailed Design, 
•	Specifications and Scope of Work,
•	Tender process (ITT-package preparation and evaluation),
•	Contractor pre-qualification & Contractor selection, 
•	Review and support to Detailed Design,
•	Risk Assessments, HAZID, JSHs,
•	Construction support and site management as Company Representative and Contractor Site Manager.


Familiar with;
- Diving and ROV operations,
- Pipeline shore pull operations (beach pulls, barge pulls), 
- Pipeline pre-commissioning (flooding, gauging, hydro testing, drying, Nitrogen and MEG filling),
- Large diameter (Segment lined) tunneling (slurry shield & earth pressure balance - EPB), 
- Surveying, 
- Project logistics, 
- Interfacing, community engagement, and 
- Working at remote and offshore locations.
profile_positions.title: PIPELINE SHORE CROSSING, MICROTUNNEL AND HORIZONTAL DIRECTIONAL DRILLING (HDD) SPECIALIST

profile_positions.description:
Development of resort-style farmhouse and surroundings on our Estate in the southern part of Brazil.

Whilst avoiding intercontinental travel during the Pandemic, working from home and using the COVID-era for the development of our farmhouse-upgrade and surrounding paddocks, including pool and entertainment area, access-roads, landscaping and gardens, orchard and veggie patches, drainage and erosion control, fence-works and security, infrastructure for our cattle and other livestock.
profile_positions.title: Owner and Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
TECHNICAL ADVISOR HDD-SHORE APPROACH

PDL, Iran (2020 - Present)

Technical Advisor (Subject Matter Expert) for Iran’s first Horizontally Drilled pipeline Shorecrossing (!), serving the HDD-Subcontractor, Main contractor and Client with ensuring the right preparations and procedures are in place and making the correct decisions during construction.
This shore approach involves a 36-inch Gas-Export pipeline for the PARS GASFIELD DEVELOPMENT PROJECT – Phase 19, with a 55mm Concrete Weight Coating, creating a total Outside Diameter of 40.4-inch. 
The drilled length is 950m and the pre-laid pipestring has a 350m long tail end, making it 1,300m length in total during the pipeline pull back operation.
The Scope includes;
•	Review of Geotechnical Data and operational procedures.
•	Attending constructability meetings between Subcontractor, Main Contractor and Client prior to mobilization to site.
•	Advising all parties involved on potential Risks and Opportunities,
•	Joining Subcontractors’ team as advisor on site during the Construction Phase.
•	Participation in construction and planning meetings with main.
profile_positions.title: Technical Advisor HDD-Pipeline Shorecrossing

profile_positions.description:
Expansion and refurbishing of the existing Cooling water system for Total's refinery in Antwerp - Belgium; the project includes above- and below-ground pipeline installation.
The underground sections are installed using conventional Micro-tunnel techniques, starting from, and finishing in relative deep construction shafts.
The bove ground pipelines are installed on sleepers and piperacks, most of which have piled-foundations.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor Civil (Foundations, Shafts and Tunnels)

profile_positions.description:
Technical Advisor for the installation of a Gas Export Pipeline underneath the shoreline with the Direct Pipe© method using the best of the worlds of Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) and Micro Tunneling (Pipe Jacking); 

I foresee a great future for the use of Direct Pipe© for pipeline shore crossings.

2017 is the year in which Direct Pipe© is used for the first time for pipeline shore crossings; ENI’s OCTP-Project in Ghana will see this fairly new trenchless pipeline installation technique used for the first time in Africa and with a length of 1,000m (1km) the Project will also set a record for the longest Direct Pipe© Shore Crossing to date.

My involvement in the Project comprises;
- Review Main-Contractor’s documents such as RFQ,  Scope of Work, Technical Specifications, and other documents,
- Asses available soil data on suitability for Direct Pipe© Installation Method,
- Advise Company and Main-Contractor on potential Risks and Opportunities,
- Review of Sub-Contractors’ Direct Pipe© Technical Proposal,
- Review of Sub-Contractor documents,
- Participate in Kick-Off sessions, Risk Assessments, Constructability Reviews and other relevant meetings. 
- Join Main-Contractors’ team on site during the Construction Phase.

The execution of the Construction Phase is scheduled from August to June 2018.
profile_positions.title: Technical Advisor Shore Crossing OCTP-Gas Project (ENI) – Ghana.

profile_positions.description:
Engineering and Construction Management of Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) Projects, including pipeline shore-crossings.
Tender Management and liaison with Clients.
profile_positions.title: International Projects Manager

profile_positions.description:
Site manager and B2B to the Project Manager for the HDD-works to install the SCPX-pipeline underneath rivers and canals throughout Azerbaijan, as part of BP’s Shah Deniz II Project.

The 48-inch SCP-X (Expansion) gas pipeline is being constructed parallel to the existing SCP and BTC pipelines for most of the ROW; For me this project is basically a repeat of the 42-inch HDD crossings for the construction of the original SCP-BTC pipelines which I installed back in 2004, as the HDD-Project Manager for FlowTex Egypt.

The following link provides information on the Shah Deniz II project;  

http://www.ogj.com/articles/2014/03/shah-deniz-ii-south-caucasus-pipeline-contracts-awarded.html

As the Deputy Project Manager I was responsible and accountable for the successful execution of the project from development to close-out, in accordance with the specified project requirements. 

Successful performance was measured in terms of Health and Safety performance for all aspects, maintenance of schedule, budget, quality of work and Client satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: HDD-Site Manager & Deputy Project Manager

company.name: Boskalis Offshore Subsea Contracting - Visser & Smit Hanab JV

profile_positions.description:
Senior Project Engineer MicroTunnelling 
South Stream Project Landfall MicroTunnels – Bulgaria.

Scope: 
Detailed Design and Construction of 4 no. 2,4m diameter x 1,035m MicroTunnel shore crossings into the Black Sea, to support the installation of the South Stream Gas Pipeline System.
• Optimize Detailed Design,
• Preparation of Method Statements and Work Procedures,
• Constructability, Risk Assessments and HAZID workshops,
• Provide technical solutions during construction, 
• Site coordination, streamlining and interface with Client and Authorities,
• Promoting Safety Culture.

Unfortunately, due to political issues between the EU and Russia the project has been suspended. As a result, the Project-team was dismantled in January 2015.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Engineer Micro Tunnelling

profile_positions.description:
Specialist input to feasibility studies, concept design, FEED and Detailed Design for pipeline crossing projects, including shoreline crossings, involving open trench, Horizontal Directional Drilling (HDD) and Microtunneling. 

Company Representative supporting the Contractor during the execution phase on site.
profile_positions.title: Senior Construction Engineer HDD and Microtunneling
